short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Extension for removing intrusive popups on San Francisco Chronicle website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Extension for removing intrusive popups on San Francisco Chronicle website (sfchronicle).
When you load the page and individual articles, you will no longer be bombarded by ads and pop-ups trying to sell you producst and memberships.
